title: $this->with($this->isType('resource')) not working
body:
Foo.php

```
<?php

namespace Bar;                                                     

class Foo                                                                   
{                                                                           
    public function getInfo($stream)                                        
    {                                                                       
        $fp = fopen($stream, 'r');                                          
        $info = $this->resolve($fp);                                        
        @fclose($fp);                                                       

        return $info;                                                       
    }                                                                       

    protected function resolve($resource)                                   
    {                                                                       
        return 'foo';                                                       
    }                                                                       
} 
```

FooTest.php

```
<?php

namespace Bar;                                                     

class FooTest extends \PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase                           
{                                                                           
    public function testGetInfo()                                           
    {                                                                       
        $obj = $this->getMock('Bar\\Foo', ['resolve']);            
        $obj                                                                
            ->expects($this->once())                                        
            ->method('resolve')                                                                      
            ->with($this->isType('resource')) 
            //->with($this->isType('string'))                                
        ;                                                                   
        $obj->getInfo(__FILE__);                                            
    }                                                                       
} 
```

The output is:

```
Failed asserting that NULL is of type "resource".  // NULL?
```

However, if I modify `$this->isType('resource')` to `$this->isType('string')`, the output is

```
Failed asserting that resource(83) of type (stream) is of type "string".  // Expected
```

Is it a bug? Thanks for taking your time!
